Following the MvcMusicStore 2.0,

When a user proceeds to checkout he is shown the AddressAndPayment page where he needs to enter his shipping information.

What i'm interested in doing is to add a drop down list for Country to display a list of countries for the user to select from, instead of a textbox.

Any ideas on how to accomplish this?

 

Feedback is much appreciated. Thank you in advance.

You should be able to follow the same pattern that the Genre and Artist dropdowns on the Edit form use: http://www.asp.net/mvc/tutorials/mvc-music-store/mvc-music-store-part-5
Look in the section titled The Create Action Methods.
